name: ALL IS ONE
description: ‘All Is One’ trancending musical, cultural and spiritual boundries. Simple Shelter is asking the question, “Can we all unite as one to create a vision of a future full of life, compassion and happiness?,” and will not give up until the global answer is “Yes.”

name: A Phoenix From the Ashes
description: From the ashes of burnt-to-the-ground anguish spawns newly found sincerity of Simple Shelter’s debut album, ‘A Phoenix From the Ashes’. A musical pictorial that embarks light, darkness, and the unknowing worlds within the mind of Joshua Bradford. With every track, listeners journey with the artist through avenues of hardships and emotional distress while touching down upon optimistic endings. All songs written and performed by Joshua Bradford plus a few featured guest artists…A MUST HAVE DESERT ISLAND PICK!
